ComicInfo.Title: From across the Western Ocean
ComicInfo.Summary: Detective Amy Sun now realizes she is not the only one on the trail of a crew of corrupt cops within her own precinct. An invisible force has already torn two men to shreds and shows no signs of stopping. And things are about to get even weirder. The victim whose murder Detective Sun is investigating just got up and walked out of the morgue. How soon before their paths cross?
